artist: Marco Alvise Pitteri; after Giovanni Battista Piazzetta
creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
signed: In plate: [Piazetta, pinxit and Pitteri, Incisor]
text: Giovanni Baptista Albrizzi (1698–1777) published many collaborations between Giovanni Battista Piazzetta and Marco Alvise Pitteri. He was the most prominent Venetian publisher of the time. His books are particularly remembered for their splendid illustrations and decorative elements. In addition to books, maps, and prints, Albrizzi published a weekly newspaper.
title: Portrait of Giovanni Baptiste Albrizzi
